works.description:
To Whom It May Concern,

Please try and have these taken down as soon as possible. We have changed 

our email procedure to only email twice a day and list all infringing  
client URLs in order not to bombard you with emails Thank you for your  
assistance in this matter, we appreciate your hard work :)!

I am writing to you to avail myself of my rights under the Digital  
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). This letter is a Notice of Infringement
as  
authorized in § 512(c) of the U.S. Copyright Law. I wish to report an  
instance of what I feel in good faith is an instance or Copyright  
Infringement. The infringing material appears on the Service for which you
 
are the designated agent.

You are registered with the U.S. Copyright Office as the Designated
Service  
Provider Agent to receive notifications of alleged Copyright infringement 

with respect to users of the Service for which you are the Designated
Agent.

1. The material which I contend belongs to a ToppleTrack client(s) and  
appears illegally on the Service is the following:

Hardwell- Spaceman

2. The material appears at the website addresses and are to be removed  
immediately :
